title: Lottery
lyrics:
I ain't neva been no pussy nigga
Say it to my face if you ain't pussy, nigga
Got a hundid niggas, that's a hundid triggers
And if you ain't a hunnit, we ain't fuckin' wit ya
Playn wit ya life, now that's a gamble
Nah, it ain't no pro'lem we can't, hell no

I just bought the bank, hit the lottery

Lottery, x2

Pussy nigga, you a walkin' limb

Pussy nigga talkin' like he want these pro'lems

Befo' I had a mill, I was a fuckin' robber

In it wit a choppa, get me a tainted watch

Boy, I need it all to

Bitch, I'm good in every hood, I don;t need no voucher

You can beef from here to Ankerm, bet them shooters find ya



I ain't neva been no pussy nigga

Say it to my face if you ain't pussy, nigga

Got a hundid niggas, that's a hundid triggers

And if you ain't a hunnit, we ain't fuckin' wit ya

Playn wit ya life, now that's a gamble

Nah, it ain't no pro'lem we can't, hell no

I just bought the bank, hit the lottery

A nigga rob me, hit the lottery

Lottery, x2

Shout out to my shootas, turn out gus salute

Damn, like a pussy nigga if I tell'em shoot

Real street nigga, don't need no hood pass x2

Shout out to the robbers and them roller bankers

Shout out to them B-Boyz that can hold me pages

Real street nigga, don't need no hood pass

Real street nigga, fuck a hood pass



I ain't neva been no pussy nigga

Say it to my face if you ain't pussy, nigga

Got a hundid niggas, that's a hundid triggers

And if you ain't a hunnit, we ain't fuckin' wit ya

Playn wit ya life, now that's a gamble

Nah, it ain't no pro'lem we can't, hell no

A nigga rob me, hit the lottery

I just bought the bank, hit the lottery

Lottery, x2

A nigga rob me, hit the lottery

Lottery, x2
